Can't believe I missed this group. Hello minna! Most of the members 
looks SO FAMILIAR :O)

Umm... Just wanted to introduce myself first to be polite. 

mg_batt here from Miburo, edojidai and SHQ. My pen name is wounds in 
fanfiction.net. Crazy about Saitou-sama and a fast growing interest 
on the Shinsengumi. I love reading the post in the groups, so many 
informative people and it gives me something to write about. Not much 
of a contributor as everytime I get anything juicy someone is already 
one step ahead. Oh well, that's how good the group is... :O)

I write stories and poems that are Saitou-sama based. I like to 
write/read, alternate pairings a lot. I like to pair Saitou-sama with 
just about anyone. Just started last December and not really a 
writer. Heck hated English and writing back in school, was more of a 
Math/Science person. So please don't kill me if by chance you read my 
fic and didn't like it. PLEASE? My bestfriend already did and she 
only read one chapter...   :O)
